billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Provides that any charges assessed by a credit card company for late payment shall not exceed 1.5 percent of the unpaid balance of any bill or fifteen dollars
summary: Provides that any charges assessed by a credit card company for late payment shall not exceed one and one-half percent of the unpaid balance of any bill or fifteen dollars.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to credit card late charges
